description: Schema for the definitions of data zones handled by the BUDA platform

version.title: Version
version.description: Schema version used for the zone declaration

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Dataset metadata describing several aspects of the information stored

keyword.title: Keyword(s)
keyword.description: Keywords related to the information in the dataset

language.title: Language(s)
language.description: Language(s) (RFC 5646) in which the data is available

license.title: License
license.description: URL to the license used to distribute the data

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: Name of the organization responsible for publishing the data

contactName.title: Contact Name
contactName.description: Name of the person listed as primary contact regarding the data

contactEmail.title: Contact Email
contactEmail.description: Email listed as primary contact method regarding the data

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Internally used identifier for the dataset, storage collection will be used by default if no value is provided

describedBy.title: Described By
describedBy.description: URL to get additional details about the information in the dataset

data.title: Internal Zone Details
data.description: Configuration parameters used for storage and processing of the data

accessLevel.title: Access Level
accessLevel.description: Specify how to distribute the data

hotspot.title: Hotspot
hotspot.description: Specify the endpoint type used to receive incoming data packets

collection.title: Collection
collection.description: Data collection used to store (as documents) all data packets received

index.title: Index
index.description: Data index(es) used for the data collection

format.title: Format
format.description: Expected data format, a valid agent must be installed for the data type

options.title: Agent Options
options.description: Additional configuration parameters passed to the agent to handle the zone; check agent documentation for specific details
